name: Tappy Ball (Navkiran_Games)
description:
First Official Game made at Navkiran Games.

Lead Developer: Rishabh Srivastava

Play the game until your finger starts paining.

Time took almost 2 months for the game making.

Issues will be fixed in the next update.
